item.title: How do i... NEED HELP PLZ!.... still need help!
item.dc:creator: @javis javis
item.description:
@javis wrote:

well it took me awhile but here they are just add to your commands

[code]else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“adminglow”) && playerRights >= 2)
{
adglow = true;
}

    else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("ownerglow") && playerRights >= 3)
    {
           ownerglow = true;
    }

    else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("pmodglowoff") && playerRights >= 1)
    {
           pmodglow =false;
    }

    else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("adminglowoff") && playerRights >= 2)
    {
           adglow = false;
    }

    else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("ownerglowoff") && playerRights >= 3)
    {
           ownerglow = false;
    }

[/code]

item.title: How do i... NEED HELP PLZ!.... still need help!
item.dc:creator: @azpker1 azpker1
item.description:
@azpker1 wrote:

go into character folder. then click on the name you want to change. look down until you see "player rights" 0 means nothing, 1 = p mod, 2 = adam, 3 = owner

errr that wasnt wat i was asking

and yo javis ty for trying to help i like ur tuts… i think it was you… must be all ur ones rock!!! hope im not mistakin… keep trying to help if u can javis u rock!

send a link or sometin… ty
